name: The Immortal LichKitty
description:
Welcome to the never ending rivalry between the LichKitty and the Mice Heroes

HOW TO PLAY : 

1 - The game is turn based, starting with the player's turn.

2 - Every turn you can spend your mana to cast your mighty spells but Beware, every spell has a mana cost and you cant spent more mana than you have.

3- Every turn LichKitty recovers 3 mana cyrstals, use them wisely.

4- The LichKitty has 4 skills : 

  • Paw of Doom : Pull your enemy one space towards the LichKitty, deals damage. 
  • Nyafe Drain : Drains the enemy's life, healing the LichKitty and dealing damage.
  • Fire Meow  : Cast a powerfull fireball, it can only targets the first enemy.
  • Fearline : Stagger your foes with a fearsome spell, interrupting them for one turn.

5- Once you are done with your evil deeds, click "End turn" and brace yourself for the heroes' might

6- Each Hero has 3 life - Warrior hero has 4 life. 

7- Killing the whole party will ensure your dark rule, but only until the next hero party arrives

8- Dont worry, the LichKitty is immortal it never trully dies - he just takes a nap for like a 100 years.
